articles.author: HT Correspondent
articles.title: In pics: Supermoon brightens up skies, two more to be witnessed in Jan 2018 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Sunday’s supermoon is one in a three-part series, according to NASA. Another supermoon sighting is expected on January 1 and January 31, 2018.
articles.content:
Stargazers were in for a treat on Sunday as they caught a glimpse of the so-called supermoon when the Moon appeared bigger and brighter in the sky as it moved closer to Earth.
